PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-06592020-09-20,  ,  ,  FIN,  OAG, 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAppointment of Price Waterhouse Coopers as auditor and of the Auditor General of Canada as joint auditor of the Canada Development Investment Corporation and its wholly-owned subsidiaries for a the 2020 fiscal year.
PrecisOrder appointing PRICE WATERHOUSE COOPERS as AUDITOR and the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR of the CANADA DEVELOPMENT INVESTMENT CORPORATION for the fiscal year ending on December 31, 2020.
AttachmentsAttachment
